EmailTemplate.name: Payment Portal Password Reset ARCHIVE
EmailTemplate.subject: Your {!Organization.Name} Payment Portal Password
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Your new {!Organization.Name} Payment Portal username and password information is below.
To submit a payment, locate the payment email sent to you at time of order, and click on the payment link therein. Use the username and password in this message to login to the Payment Portal.
At that point, you will be prompted to establish a new, permanent Payment Portal password. Please note this password for future payment transactions.
Thank you,
{!Organization.Name} Customer Support
Note: This email is sent via our automated payment system. Please do not reply to this message, as responses will not be received.
Instead, if you have questions about our Payment Portal or your payments, please contact your RH Contract sales representative.
